reviews.title: Nice

reviews.comment: I had it at 5 stars but now lowered it because I am not able to collect a reward when I already received first place. Please fix this!!!! Other than that; great game.

reviews.title: Update: buggy
reviews.comment: Fantastic game, but the latest update is very buggy. Most of my buildings & decorations no longer load.  The icons for items in the store have vanished. Repeatedly crashing too. Any news on a fix for these?
